Npc_Talk005:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I think you'll find him near the <clr:0000>lone cedar<clr:ffff>
on <clr:0000>Talonto Peak<clr:ffff>. It's visible to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>
after you leave the cave.
Npc_Talk007:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>I'm waiting for Tulin. We were supposed
to go looking for food together, but he's
running late.<sp:0:4:0>Probably still getting ready at <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>.
I can wait a little longer.
Npc_Talk008:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>It's past time for us to get to work.
Could Tulin still be at <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>Nothing to do but keep waiting, I guess.
Npc_Talk009:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>We have no way of knowing what we'll
find above those clouds...<sp:0:4:0>If I was going up there, I'd make sure
I was prepared for the worst.
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>After the freak blizzard we just went
through, a little rain is nothing.
Npc_Talk001:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's not that Tulin is untalented.
Far from it.<sp:0:4:0>Everyone admires his <clr:0000>ability to generate
his own gusts<clr:ffff>. No one else in the village
can do anything like it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>The problem is he knows he's talented,
and it makes him headstrong and prone
to acting rashly. His youth doesn't help.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>But I shouldn't be standing around talking
to passing travelers about this.<sp:0:4:0>I need to report this to Harth so we can
discuss what to do about it.
Npc_Talk002:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>If you're going after Tulin, you'll want to
head into that cave.
Npc_Talk003:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>Our investigations haven't revealed what's
above those clouds. You should be ready
for anything before you head out.
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I had half given up on seeing that bridge
repaired. There are bright days ahead
for Rito Village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Especially with me on guard duty ensuring
that travelers can cross without fear!<sp:0:4:0>Thank you for all you've done.
Npc_Talk004: <sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>I hope he's not up to anything reckless.
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy>There are bright days ahead for Rito
Village. Feel free to visit us whenever
you want.
